additionalInformation: For strength heroes, it grants 120 mana and 0.5 mana regen.
For agility heroes, it grants 120 mana and 0.5 mana regen.
For intelligence heroes, it grants 120 mana, 0.5 mana regen and 10 attack damage.
name: Staff of Wizardry
description: A staff of magical powers passed down from the eldest mages.
